title: Child ‘sawed dachshund’s legs off then claimed they’d just fallen off’
text:
Buddy the dachshund had his legs sawed off by a 17 year-old girl, who then tried to tell sheriff’s deputies that they’d just fallen off. The girl, her mother and a friend have all been arrested (Pictures: Facebook)

A 17 year-old sawed a dachshund’s legs off then tried to claim the dog’s legs had just dropped off.

The unnamed child, her 50 year-old mother and 17 year-old friend are said to have failed to seek treatment for the dog after he was shot in February.

That left the dog, named Buddy by rescuers, paralyzed, prompting the trio, from Slidell in Louisiana, to attempt some agonizing amateur surgery on the helpless pet.

Deputies from St Tammany Parish Sheriff’s Office were alerted to Buddy’s plight on September 25, and visited the trailer park where he lived, according to WGNO.

There, the woman and her daughter tried to claim that Buddy’s legs had simply fallen off after being bandaged too tightly following the shooting.

Buddy was paralyzed after being shot earlier this year – and then forced to undergo agonizing amateur surgery at the hands of a teenager (Picture: Facebook)

Deputies didn’t believe their story, and took Buddy to a veterinarian, who said the dog’s horrific wounds had been ‘maliciously inflicted.’

The vet added that Buddy’s legs hadn’t dropped off naturally, and said the roughness of the sawing indicated that he hadn’t been treated by a professional either.

St Tammany Parish Sheriff Randy Smith said: ‘As a dog owner myself, I was completely appalled when we received a complaint of such horrific animal cruelty in our community.

‘Our investigators acted swiftly, and the parties responsible have been charged accordingly

That saw the 17 year-old daughter charged with aggravated animal cruelty and booked into Florida Parishes Juvenile Detention Center.

Despite his ordeal, Buddy is recovering well, with a fundraising drive set up to help pay his medical bills (Picture: Facebook)

The teen’s mother was hit with a less serious animal cruelty charge and released on a summons.

The other teenager was also arrested for animal cruelty, and released into the custody of a relative.

Despite Buddy’s ordeal, the little dog is doing well, and is receiving intensive treatment to help him recover.

A Facebook page set up to help pay his medical bills.
